title: ITSY Pets Dry Shampoo for Dogs & Cats Detangler Foam Comb No-Rinse Waterless Formula – Plastic-Free 10ml Concentrated Refill & Reusable 100ml Applicator (Dry Shampoo Starter Pack)
features: *** Innovative Comb Foaming Bottle *** The specially designed 100ml comb applicator dispenses foam evenly while brushing through your pet’s fur, making cleaning easy, efficient, and mess-free.
*** No-Rinse, Waterless Formula *** Perfect for quick clean-ups at home or on the go—no water required. Removes dirt, odours, and grime while leaving your pet’s coat fresh and soft.

*** Eco-Friendly & Sustainable Design *** Includes a 10ml plastic-free concentrated refill and a reusable 100ml foaming bottle. Mix the refill at home with water to reduce plastic waste, transportation costs, and CO₂ emissions.

*** Gentle & Effective Cleaning *** The formula contains skin-friendly ingredients that clean and refresh your pet’s fur without irritation, making it suitable for dogs and cats of all breeds and sizes.
*** Convenient & Cost-Effective *** With the reusable bottle and concentrated refill, you get a long-lasting solution that saves money and reduces your environmental footprint.
description: Product Description Safe & Natural Ingredients Always prioritising safety & nature. Our pet care products are crafted with gentle, natural ingredients—because your furry friends deserve the very best, without compromises. Eco-Conscious Packaging We care deeply for our planet. Our packaging is designed for recycling—made from glass, aluminium, or recyclable plastic. Our mission? To minimise waste and CO₂ emissions while delivering top-quality pet care. REFILL SYSTEM Introducing our Refill System—perfected through months of testing! A sustainable solution that maintains premium quality while reducing production waste and transport impact. Better for pets, better for Earth.

product_details_tab_data.Title: ITSY Pets Dry Shampoo for Dogs & Cats Detangler Foam Comb No-Rinse Waterless Formula – Plastic-Free 10ml Concentrated Refill & Reusable 100ml Applicator (Dry Shampoo Starter Pack)
product_details_tab_data.Categories - Tree: Pet Supplies › Dogs › Grooming › Shampoos & Conditioners › Shampoos
product_details_tab_data.Recommended Uses: The unique comb foaming applicator makes cleaning easier than ever, while the concentrated refill system helps you care for your pets and the planet. Whether it’s a muddy walk or an everyday freshen-up, this no-rinse formula ensures your pets look and smell their best, no water needed.
product_details_tab_data.Product Benefit: Whether it’s a muddy walk or an everyday freshen-up, this no-rinse formula ensures your pets look and smell their best, no water needed.
product_details_tab_data.Included Components: 1 x Empty 100ml Reusable Foaming Comb Applicator; 1 x 10ml Plastic-Free Refill Concentrate
product_details_tab_data.Special Ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua; Lauryl Betaine; Sodium Lauryl Polyoxyethylene Ether Sulfate; C8-10-alkyl Glycosides; Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate; Betaine Monohydrate; 2-Phenoxyethanol; 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one.
